## About Generators

Contains various mini applications that helps complete various tasks. These various generators will be added overtime as required or deemed fit.

		</td>

## License

Generators is currently a personal software, intended for internal and personal use and thus,
all sub-systems are designed for those purposes only.

Licensed under MIT, feel free to fork the project and modify parts as needed.

## Installation

All installers are provided and are found under the "Releases" area of this repository.
https://github.com/Virus5600/Generators/releases

Just download and run an installer to install Generators.

## Running Locally

#### Requirements:
* Node Package Manager (NPM) ^v9.6.6
* Node ^v20.2.0

#### Instructions:
1) **[OPTIONAL]** Fork the project over to your account.
2) Clone the project to your local device.
4) Open a terminal and make sure to have the requirements in the `PATH` variable.
3) Run `npm i` to install all dependencies.
4) Run `npm run mix` to compile assets.
5) Run `npm run dev` to run the Electron application.
6) Enjoy~
